DOC.brief_summary: The objective of this study was to prove the bioequivalence of Levetiracetam 750 mg Tablets under fed conditions
DOC.brief_title: Bioequivalency Study of Levetiracetam 750 mg Tablets Under Fed Conditions
DOC.criteria: No clinically significant abnormal findings on the physical examination, medical history, or clinical laboratory results during screening Positive test for HIV, Hepatitis B, or Hepatitis C. Treatment with known enzyme altering drugs. History of allergic or adverse response to Levetiracetam or any comparable or similar product.
